thread.title: Bernie Sanders plans to launch television advertising next month in Iowa and New Hampshire
thread.title_full: Bernie Sanders plans to launch television advertising next month in Iowa and New Hampshire - Worldnews.com

author: wn.com
title: Bernie Sanders plans to launch television advertising next month in Iowa and New Hampshire
text: Democratic presidential hopeful Bernie Sanders plans to start a robust television advertising campaign next month in Iowa and New Hampshire, two states where Hillary Rodham Clinton has been on the air since August, a senior strategist for Sanders’s campaign said Wednesday. Word of the decision comes as some recent polls have shown Clinton increasing her […] ...
